Detailed Description

Describes all necessary data for a font, like the name, height, baseline, gap between characters, look of the characters etc.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Font::SystemFontId
 

Every theme offers fonts for components and parts of components. These fonts can easily accessed by the system-font-id: const Font& font = System::GetFont(Font::Client)

Enumerator:
Client  Font for the client-area of a control.
ActiveTitle  Font for the window-title, when the window has the focus.
InactiveTitle  Font for the window-title, when the window has not the focus.
Softkeys  Font used by the softkeys of a window.
Menu  Font used for menus.
TextEditor  Font used by editors using the text-editor-document.
SystemFontIdCount

INT Font::GetTextWidth (  const WCHAR *  text,
TextAttr  text_attr,
INT  from = 0,
INT  n_chars = -1,
BOOLEAN  include_gap = FALSE
)  const
 

Parameters:
text Pointer to the text.
from Start-index for counting (index starts at 0).
n_chars Number of characters to count. 0 means counting all characters.
include_gap If set to TRUE, the gap of the last character will be added.
Returns:
Width of the text in pixels.
